Description: Textile (garment?); fragment of cloth; simple tabby weave, weft-faced extended tabby; undyed linen with bands or stripes in purple silkn Warp: Z-spun linen, ca 20 ends/cm Weft: Z-spun linen, ca 27 picks/cm, Silk (without twist?), ca 45 pairs/cm Edges: fragmentary
Curator's comments: History of use: probably clothing. Z-spinning points to comparatively late date. Silk may be in warp rather than weft. H. Granger-Taylor, 19/09/1989
Condition: Poor: linen very fragile - conservation (unknown date): stuck to a sticky net.
